name: Talent Hive
subtitle: Shortlist 100s or resumes using a powerful AI.
desc: Talent Hive simplifies talent supply chain for HR managers and candidates by using a powerful AI to shortlist candidates with an intuitive and simple UI.

sections.sectionText: Parsing information and scoring profiles made easy!

sectionData.text: We have used SpaCy as our primary deep learning model and have trained it over 100s of resumes to filter out the perfect candidates according to the job description.

The algorithm works by parsing information from the PDF, categorizing the information and extracting primary hard and soft skills, and scoring the profile against a job description to present the perfect candidate.

The parsing happens with the built-in NER model trained over our resume pool and the scoring is done using cosine similarity and correlation between the job description and the profile.

sections.sectionheading: The perfect tool for HR Managers
sections.sectionText: Parsing information and scoring profiles made easy!

sectionData.text:
The dashboard is laid out in a simple manner with all posted jobs on one panel and jobs posted by other HRMS in the panel below.

HRMs can also view scheduled interviews from the right bar and the persistent left navigation bar provides access to all app routes from all screens.
The HRM can easily create a new job simply by clicking the create job button from the left panel.

Before creating the job, the HRM can preview the job before publishing.

Upon publishing, the job can be viewed on the user dashboard screen.

HRMS can then view the job easily in their dashboard under the created jobs window.

Once they access it, they can view the posted job with various options and also the applications of the candidates who applied.

This is where the NLP shortlists candidates by scoring each application and presenting the top candidates under the shortlisted tab.

Candidates can then view the application response to their job post of the specific candidate by clicking on their applicaiton.

The NLP engine parses all the information from the resume and presents it in this beautiful format along with the resume score which is simple and clutter free.

HRMs can then simple accept, reject, or schedule an interview with the candidates without any hassle.

The candidates will be sent a notification if the interview is scheduled.
The HRMs can further administer and manage compnay details as well as other HRMs within the company in the company screen.
HRM Admins can add company logos and edit company details.
The HRM admin can also make other people admins or remove them from adminship.
HRM admin can also add or delete new HRMs to the company by creating their accounts.

sections.sectionText: No need to manually enter information anymore!

sectionData.text:
Job seekers can browse through our job-board without needing an account.

The job board is laid out in a very simple but at the same time informative fashion that makes it accessible for people to access the job-board.

Jobs can also be viewed without needing an account before applying to them.

The screen is informative and contains information about the HRM who posted the job along with their Email and LinkedIn details (if they choose to show it).

The job application screen is where the magic happens.

Upon uploading of the CV, our server uploads it to an AWS bucket, then it goes through our NLP engine, and it fields below are filled with the parsed output.
We've carefully made the fields modular to cater to multiple professional experiences and educational records.

All these fields are changeable and users can add as many fields as they like.

The website initially adds the same number of experiences listed on the resume, but users have the freedom to delete or add as many entries as they please.
The applicant can view the job applied in the applied screen.

The status of the application changes when the engine shortlists the application or the job poster chooses to accept or reject the application.

Applicants get the notification of the application status on the right bar, along with the interview timing.
Applicants can always edit their info and add new pictures from the edit screen.

Applying to jobs after creating your account becomes a breeze. Our job board personalizes to the applicants core competencies and candidates can directly apply to jobs after answering optional questions posed by the job posters.
